name: Cool Guy's Adventures
description:
In less than 6 months I made this piece of game art... Hope you have fun.

Better to play it with gamepad.

Made on Godot Engine.

Controls:
keys WASD/ joy left stick — move
key E/ joy Y - action/read/get-in-get out
key Space/ joy A - jump key F/ joy X - shoot
key Shift/ joy L1 - stand still(when shoot)
key Ctrl / joy L2 - lie
key Esc / joy start - Options
key Esc, BackSpace / joy B - Back
